title: dear evil genius who invented individual frozen pizza
body:
Your ploy to increase box size and price... but NOT THE SIZE OF THE PIZZA has me very upset. I demand justice to be *served*.

I was at the store and was very pleased to see my junk food of choice has increased in size (meh, price wasn't too concerning, its cheap stuff) and I bought 5. That'll last atleast a month and a half... I just opened one (a week later) and BAM its the same damn size as before but in a slightly larger box!!! For a higher price!!!

I am outraged and so should every one on GD

~I am outaged~
